title: Moon in Aquarius
summary: A cool emotional climate that favors perspective and community thinking. Feelings process through ideas, shared causes, and stepping back to see the system.

meaning.headline: Emotions lean objective, future-focused, and socially aware.

frames.text: With the Moon in Aquarius, moods may detach slightly to gain clarity.
Group dynamics and collective impact feel more noticeable.
Shared values and causes can reconnect feeling.

opportunities: Discussing plans with communities of interest
Connecting feelings to a larger cause

do: Name the principle guiding your decision.
Check in with trusted peers for feedback.
Balance analysis with a quick body scan for emotion.
Design a small experiment to try a new idea.
Stay open to others' pacing and context.
avoid: Disengaging from intimacy to stay efficient

reusable_lines.text: The mood is cool-headed and tuned to the bigger picture today.
Shared values and smart experiments carry emotions forward under this sky.

forbidden_claims: Promises about technological or social outcomes
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on perspective and community
Agency-based choices about experimentation and boundaries
Contextual language about balancing logic and feeling

sources: Moon in Aquarius as short-term climate of perspective
